title: GA Release Manifest
description: A manifest of all artifacts included in a General Availability release.

version.description: The release version, derived from the Git tag.

git_ref.description: The Git commit hash the release was built from.

build_timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp of the build.

name.description: The canonical name of the artifact component (e.g., 'server', 'client').

file.description: The relative path to the artifact from the release directory root.

hash.description: The SHA-256 hash of the artifact.

sbom_ref.description: The relative path to the artifact's SBOM.

provenance_ref.description: The relative path to the artifact's provenance document.
